author: L_104963
title: 去年陕西水土保持率增幅创历史新高
text:
去年陕西水土保持率增幅创历史新高
2025年03月13日08:39 | 来源：
陕西日报
小字号
原标题：去年陕西水土保持率增幅创历史新高
2024年，陕西水土保持率提升至70.81%，较上年度提高0.66个百分点；年度水土流失面积较上年度减少1352.03平方公里，强烈及以上水土流失面积较上年度减少448.29平方公里；减少水土流失面积和水土保持率增幅均创历史新高，生态系统质量和稳定性持续向好。这是记者3月12日从省水利厅了解到的。
陕西省实施深层次革新、多维度攻坚，水土保持工作取得新成效。一是水土保持体制机制逐步完善。修订《陕西省水土保持条例》，出台《陕西省水土保持监测站网建设与运行管理办法》等，进一步规范了水土保持管理工作。二是综合治理力度不断加大。全年新增水土流失治理面积4915平方公里，实施拦沙（淤地）工程283座，实施坡耕地综合治理8.71万亩，治理南水北调中线工程水源地水土流失面积2580平方公里。三是水土保持监管有序推进。依托遥感技术实施全域人为扰动全监管，排查生产建设项目弃渣场，坚决遏制人为水土流失。四是水土保持监测水平持续提高。完成省级水土流失动态监测，实施典型暴雨水土流失专项调查，开展增发国债丹江口库区水土流失治理项目典型生态清洁小流域建设成效监测评估。五是水土保持科技创新支撑有力。积极探索生态产品价值实现路径，延安市薛张小流域碳汇交易为黄河流域首单水土保持碳汇交易，榆林市米脂县高西沟淤地坝碳汇交易系我国首单淤地坝碳汇交易；完成全省水土保持小流域划分工作，为水土保持规划编制、项目选址、精细管理奠定坚实基础。
“我们将坚持多元化管理、多部门合作、跨行业交流，强化创新驱动，持续推动生态产品价值转化，确保人为水土流失得到有效控制，重点区域水土流失得到系统治理，生态系统水土保持功能持续改善。”省水利厅相关负责人说。 （记者 徐颖）
(责编：贾凯璐、魏鑫)

author: TyC Sports.com
title: Tras el escándalo con San Lorenzo, la policía de Brasil reprimió a los hinchas de Nacional en San Pablo - TyC Sports
text: Tras el escándalo con San Lorenzo, la policía de Brasil reprimió a los hinchas de Nacional en San Pablo En el marco de la visita del Bolso al Tricolor en el Morumbí por Copa Libertadores, luego de que el local se ponga 2-0 apareció la fuerza de seguridad para golpear a los fanáticos del elenco montevideano. La represión de la policía de Brasil a los hinchas de Nacional en San Pablo Un nuevo hecho de violencia se registró en la visita de un equipo a Brasil con la represión por parte de la policía local a los hinchas de Nacional de Montevideo, en el marco de su visita a San Pablo en el Morumbí por la vuelta de los octavos de final de la Copa Libertadores 2024. Ni bien inició el complemento, el local logró estirar su ventaja gracias al gol de Jonathan Calleri pero el partido no se reanudó de inmediato sino que demoró varios minutos por la preocupación de los jugadores del Bolso por sus hinchas, ya que la fuerza de seguridad ingresó a su tribuna y empezó a golpearle con sus bastones. Este no es el primer caso de violencia en el país vecino en esta semana de competencia internacional, ya que los hinchas de San Lorenzo también sufrieron esos maltratos en su juego ante Atlético Mineiro en Belo Horizonte por parte de la policía militar brasileña. En los reportes posteriores a los incidentes del martes por la noche se dieron cuenta de la existencia de al menos un detenido y un herido de bala de goma entre la parcialidad argentina, sumado a los problemas que tuvieron para dejar el país. Mirá también []https://www.tycsports.com/copa-libertadores/maxima-preocupacion-por-juan-izquierdo-se-desplomo-en-la-visita-de-nacional-a-san-pablo-id603728.html Preocupación por Juan Izquierdo, entubado y en terapia intensiva: el parte médico de Nacional No te pierdas nada

author: @newsinfo
title: Опасная красота: чем одуванчики вредят участку и как от них избавиться | Lifestyle | Seldon News
text: Яркие и солнечные одуванчики, украшающие весенние лужайки, могут доставить немало хлопот садоводам. Несмотря на свою декоративную привлекательность, эти растения отличаются агрессивным характером: быстро разрастаются, угнетают соседнюю растительность и буквально "высасывают" питательные вещества из почвы. Однако бороться с ними можно и без использования агрессивной химии — с помощью средства, которое найдётся в каждом доме. Садоводы утверждают, что эффективным и безопасным способом борьбы с одуванчиками может стать обыкновенная соль. В сочетании с кипятком она нарушает жизненные процессы... author: ABNewswire
title: Pixune: Pushing the Boundaries of 3D Animation with Unmatched
text:
Pixune: Pushing the Boundaries of 3D Animation with Unmatched Creativity 04-02-2025 11:18 PM CET | Business, Economy, Finances, Banking & Insurance
Press release from: ABNewswire
Introduction
3D animation has revolutionized the world of entertainment, gaming, marketing, and more. One studio that has mastered the craft of storytelling through breathtaking visuals is Pixune. Whether you're looking for high-quality character animation, engaging game cinematics, or impressive advertising visuals, Pixune delivers stunning results. This article dives deep into Pixune's expertise, services, and what makes it stand out in the competitive world of 3D animation.
What is 3D Animation?
3D animation is the process of creating moving digital images in a three-dimensional space. This technique is widely used in films, video games, advertisements, and virtual reality.
The Evolution of 3D Animation
From early CGI effects in movies to photorealistic animations in modern games, 3D animation has come a long way. Studios like Pixune are at the forefront of this evolution, constantly pushing boundaries. Pixune is a top-tier 3D animation studio [ https://pixune.com/3d-animation-studio/ ] known for creating stunning visuals that bring stories to life.
Why Choose Pixune for 3D Animation?
* Expertise: Years of experience in delivering high-quality 3D animation.
* Creativity: A team of passionate artists and animators.
* Technology: Cutting-edge tools for seamless animation.
* Customization: Tailored solutions to meet specific client needs.
Services Offered by Pixune Character Animation
Pixune specializes in breathing life into characters with realistic expressions and movements.
Game Cinematics
Game developers rely on Pixune to create immersive cinematics that captivate players.
Architectural Visualization
From real estate to urban planning, Pixune's 3D animations help visualize projects with stunning accuracy.
Motion Graphics
Perfect for branding and advertising, Pixune's motion graphics add a dynamic touch to marketing campaigns.
Product Animation
Pixune helps businesses showcase their products in 3D, making presentations more engaging and informative.
The Creative Process at Pixune
* Concept Development - Understanding the client's vision.
* Storyboarding - Creating a visual blueprint.
* Modeling - Designing characters and environments.
* Texturing and Rigging - Adding realism and movement capabilities.
* Animation - Bringing everything to life.
* Rendering - Producing the final high-quality output.
* Post-Production - Editing and refining the animation.
Industries That Benefit from Pixune's 3D Animation
* Entertainment (Movies, TV Shows)
* Gaming (Game Trailers, Cutscenes)
* Marketing & Advertising (Commercials, Product Demos)
* Education & Training (E-learning, Simulations)
* Architecture & Real Estate (Virtual Tours, Concept Visualization)
Pixune's Commitment to Quality and Innovation
Pixune doesn't just follow industry standards; it sets them. With a focus on innovation and precision, the studio ensures every project exceeds expectations.
Tools and Technologies Used at Pixune
* Autodesk Maya - For modeling and animation
* Blender - Open-source 3D creation
* ZBrush - Digital sculpting
* Adobe After Effects - Post-production enhancements
* Unity & Unreal Engine - Game development
Behind the Scenes: How a 3D Animation is Made
The journey from a concept to a final animated video involves multiple stages, each requiring skill, patience, and attention to detail.
The Importance of Storytelling in 3D Animation
Great animation isn't just about visuals; it's about compelling storytelling. Pixune ensures every project has a strong narrative backbone.
Pixune's Top 3D Animation Projects
* Fantasy RPG Game Cinematics
* Realistic Product Commercials
* Animated Short Films
The Role of AI in 3D Animation
Artificial Intelligence is transforming animation workflows, making processes faster and more efficient. Pixune leverages AI to enhance production quality.
The Future of 3D Animation
With advancements in VR, AR, and AI, the future of 3D animation looks more promising than ever. Pixune continues to adapt to these changes to stay ahead of the curve.
How to Hire Pixune for Your 3D Animation Needs
Interested in working with Pixune? Visit their official website, check out their portfolio, and reach out for a consultation.
Conclusion
Pixune has established itself as a leader in the 3D animation industry. With a commitment to quality, innovation, and storytelling, the studio continues to create breathtaking animations for a diverse range of clients. If you're looking for a professional 3D animation studio, Pixune is your go-to choice.
Media Contact
Company Name: Pixune
Contact Person: Hillary Clinton
Email:Send Email [ https://www.abnewswire.com/email_contact_us.php?pr=pixune-pushing-the-boundaries-of-3d-animation-with-unmatched-creativity ]
City: New York
Country: United States
Website: http://ttps://pixune.com/

author: 网易
title: 风雨共担 山城同舟 防汛抗灾中的重庆力量|强降雨_网易政务
text:
（原标题：风雨共担 山城同舟 防汛抗灾中的重庆力量）
风雨共担 山城同舟 防汛抗灾中的重庆力量 （来源：视频综合）
7月8日以来，重庆多个地区迎来强降雨天气，各级部门全力以赴投入防汛工作，保护群众的生命财产安全。风雨共担，山城同舟，感谢所有奋战在防汛救灾一线的人们，因为你们的守护，我们，很安心！
本文来源：华 龙 网 责任编辑： 汪丽_NB26155

author: @UnioneSarda
title: Palestra a cielo aperto al parco Europa  - L'Unione Sarda.it
text:
Un nuova palestra a cielo aperto per Quartu. L’inaugurazione è prevista per domani - dalle 10 - al parco Europa di Pitz’e Serra. Un’area sportiva realizzata grazie al progetto Sport di tutti – Parchi, ideato da Sport e Salute, la società dello Stato per la promozione dello sport e dei sani stili di vita, e promosso assieme ad Anci, al quale il Comune ha aderito ottenendo il finanziamento.
L’area attrezzata digitalizzata - in rete con tutte le altre già installate nel resto d’Italia - si trova all’interno di una delle maggiori oasi ambientali della città, il parco Europa, e sarà un luogo dedicato al benessere di tutti i quartesi. Per stare insieme, per praticare attività fisica, esercitandosi da soli o in gruppo. Su ogni singolo attrezzo ciascun sportivo potrà scaricare i tutorial di allenamento, attraverso un semplice QR Code. Il Comune si occuperà direttamente della gestione dell’area attrezzata, che viene messa a disposizione delle associazioni sportive del territorio e di tutta la cittadinanza, senza limiti di età.
All’inaugurazione di domani saranno presenti l’assessora allo Sport Cinzia Carta, la referente Progetto Sport nei parchi Sardegna Rossella Agabio. E in qualità di testimonial ci sarà il quartese Patrick Cappai, campione del mondo in carica di pugilato.
RIPRODUZIONE RISERVATA
